621200.name: Fantasy Grounds - Ddraig Goch's Tyranny 1 (Token Pack)
621200.description:
Ddraig Goch's Tyranny Pack 1

This product depicts 50 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games. The pack consists of both good and evil forces. Adult Blue Dragon, Ambush Drakes, Commoner Children, both male and female. Commoner Adults, both male and female, Dragonborn, Kobolds, Flying Kobolds, Cultists, both male and female, Acolytes, both male and female, Guards, Rats, Defenders, Dragonclaws, and Clerics.
This Token Pack includes:
  • 4 Commoner Boys
  • 4 Commoner Girls
  • 4 Commoner Woman
  • Dragonclaw
  • Female Acolyte
  • Female Commoner with Spear
  • Governor
  • Half-Orc Guard
  • Human Female Cultist
  • 3 Human Male Cultists
  • Human Male Guard
  • 4 Kobolds with Dagger
  • 4 Kobolds with Slings
  • Male Acolyte
  • Male Commoner Wounded
  • Male Half-Elf Priest
  • Male Red Shield-Dwarf
  • 4 Male Town Defenders with Crossbow
  • Male Town Defender with Polearm
  • Male Town Defender with Sword
  • 4 Ambush Drakes
  • Female Head Cleric
  • Flying Kobold
  • Male Dragonborn Champion
  • Swarm of Rats
  • 3 Adult Blue Dragons
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
